name: Coloring Top: Draw & Color In
description:
Coloring Top provides a boundless horizon to your fantasy. Color this world as you and only you can see it.

It is better than colouring by numbers.
Coloring Top will uncover your inner painter - just try.

Color therapy is a wonderful and most easily accessible meditative practice for children and adults alike. It can help you to achieve the state of ultimate relaxation most quickly. It’s no secret that coloring is considered to be the best anti-stress technique all around the world.

Take a break and relax with Coloring Top. This is one of the best methods against stress.

Just 15 minutes with Coloring Top - and you are ready for new achievements and triumphs. Yes, Coloring Top can help it, indeed.
Tell your friends and share your masterpieces on social networks.
ColorizeTop is more than just a colouring tool.

Only we have UNIQUE functions for your inspiration:

• Exclusive templates
• THE BIGGEST library of images.
• Regular updates of our collection.
• Diverse palettes grouped by subject and shade
• Option allowing you to create your own palettes
• A convenient panel and colour switching
• A choice of filling and brushes
• Transparency and line thickness settings
• Option to save your work to your cell phone gallery or share it on social networks
